DOC.brief_summary: This study blind , prospective , single-center , clinical study conduct Japanese female subject age 20-75 year . This design use skin biopsy sample environmentally expose area unexposed ( control ) area within subject assess gene expression profile three different age group .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective skin age study investigate change gene expression pattern occur age process .
DOC.criteria: Individuals willing read sign inform consent form prior participate study . Individuals temperature less equal 100 degree F time biopsy collection . Individuals apply sunless tan product arm within past year . Individuals prior history alcoholism ( consume few 2 3 alcoholic beverage per day ) . Individuals consume antiaging nutritional supplement ( multivitamin multiminerals acceptable ) aspirin , NSAIDS , pain medication last 48 hour biopsy . Male gender Individuals fit 'inclusion criterion ' .
